page.title: 20LOCAL HISTORY LANDMARKS
page.content: {Cowan Institute,High Street Town Hall, {built 1893 of Pink Freestone.}High Street Public well,built 1864.Monument to 309 French Prisoners of Napoleonic war.{StMungos Parish Church,1771 built {on site of old St.Kentigen Church of {13th century. }St.James the Less built 1882.{South Church Peebles Road built {1882 ornamented facade,stained glass {circular windows.}Uttershill Castle ruins,late 16th century. {Ramsay's {Monument_built by Sir John Clerk 1759, {obelisk pierced with round holes.Cauld {Shaulders Park over looking Penicuik {House.}Penicuik House: remains of house of 1761 by Sir James Clerk. Completed 1857,gutted by fire 1899. {Stable block converted into a house {for the Clerk family with replica of {Roman shrine reproduced as a doocot. Replica Roman Watch Tower(1745_51) built on Knights Law.
